英文法規名稱: Sanitation Standard for Foods to be Eaten Raw
中文法規名稱: 生食用食品類衛生標準（96.12.21訂定）
沿革內容:
1. DOH Food No.0960408889, December, 21, 2007.
2. DOH Food No.1001302261, August, 5, 2011.
3. Amended on August 20, 2013

法規內容.條文內容: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
Foods to be eaten raw means such foods to be served after preparing treatments like washing and peeling.
Products shall have their original pleasant flavor or color. No putridity, discoloration, off odor and flavor, contamination, moulds, foreign matter or parasite shall be found.
